document.full_text: capcom has confirmed it is working on a brand new resident evil title for pc, playstation 3 and xbox 360 that will ship this winter.
document.title: capcom unveils 'resident evil: operation raccoon city'
lines_and_colors: capcom has confirmed it is working on a brand new resident evil title for pc, playstation 3 and xbox 360 that will ship this winter.
